A dad who is covered head to toe in huge tumours has issued a desperate plea for help after his daughter started showing signs of the same horrific disease. 
Sudjaj, 69, cruelly dubbed 'Grape Man' due to his deformity, said he avoids leaving the house because his appearance scares other people. 
The pensioner from Thailand first started developing bumps and swelling when he was just 10 years old. 
He is now plagued by the rare condition which has covered his entire body in painful tumours. 
Sudjaj said his family never had enough money to pay for treatment when he was a youngster. Read More Sudjai started showing signs of the rare condition when he was 10 years old (Photo: Exclusivepix Media) 
Medics diagnosed Sudjaj with neurofibromatosis which causes tumours to develop in the nervous system. 
His doctor Jhinda said: "Sometimes these are not so serious and patients can live pretty normal lives. 
"However, in this case the tumours are beginning to close his eyes and, anyway, they prevent normal sleep patterns as they are so uncomfortable." 
Sudjaiâ€™s daughter, 36, is now beginning to show signs of the condition and his son, a general labourer, is the sole income source for the family.
